Title: Relates to shoreline resiliency infrastructure regulations and tax credits
Summary: Relates to shoreline resiliency infrastructure regulations and tax credits for twenty-five percent of the costs of such projects.
LawCode: Add §3-0321, En Con L; amd §§210-B & 606, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law and the tax law, in relation to shoreline resiliency infrastructure regulations and tax credits
